title: Empowering Jobs Act of 2015
content: Empowering Jobs Act of 2015 Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to tax-exempt enterprise zone facility bonds and empowerment zones, to: (1)nbsp. Include as employees of a qualified business entity employees who are residents ofnbsp. An empowerment zone, an enterprise community, or a qualified low-income community, and (2)nbsp. Extend the period of designation for empowerment zones through December 31, 2016 .
